thread.title: Hang Chan Joins Celtic Bank As Vice President, Business Development
thread.title_full: Hang Chan Joins Celtic Bank As Vice President, Business Development

title: Hang Chan Joins Celtic Bank As Vice President, Business Development
text: Hang Chan Joins Celtic Bank As Vice President, Business Development   SALT LAKE CITY   Celtic Bank is pleased to announce that Hang Chan has been hired as Vice President, Business Development in the bank's SBA and Commercial Lending Department. Hang will be based out of San Francisco, California . Hang joins Celtic Bank with over 12 years of sales and credit experience in business banking and SBA. Most recently, Hang was a senior SBA credit underwriter who had helped customers with over $70MM in credit requests at the Wells Fargo Bank in San Francisco . Continue Reading Hang Chan, VP Business Development in SBA Lending Celtic Bank "I am especially looking forward to how we can help an underserved segment of customers with creative credit solutions to meet their needs," said Hang. "I look forward to working with a talented team of professionals and to contributing to the success of Celtic Bank." "We are excited that Hang has joined the Celtic Bank family. His background in commercial credit analysis and business development will be instrumental in our consistent growth," said Tom Green , SVP of Business Development. Hang earned a Master in Business Administration from Leavey School of Business at Santa Clara University and Bachelor of Art degree from University of California , Davis. To learn more about Celtic Bank, please visit www.celticbank.com or contact Trent Wardrop at .  releases/hang-chan-joins-celtic-bank-as-vice-president-business-development-300411758.html SOURCE Celtic Bank
